name: Acid Splash
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 60 ft,
Dex save, success - no damage; 1 or 2 creatures within 5 ft of each other (PHB 211)

name: Chill Touch
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 120 ft,
Target can't regain HP; Undead dis. on attacks vs. me until my next turn (PHB 221)

name: Eldritch Blast
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 120 ft,
Each d10 is a separate beam requiring separate rolls (PHB 237)

name: Fire Bolt
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 120 ft,

name: Poison Spray
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 10 ft,
Con save, success - no damage; 1 creature (PHB 266)

name: Produce Flame
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 30 ft,
10-ft radius bright light and 10-ft radius dim light until thrown (PHB 269)

name: Ray of Frost
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 60 ft,
Target -10 ft speed until start of my next turn (PHB 271)

name: Sacred Flame
properties:

name: Shillelagh
properties:
Type: Simple

Imbued club or quarterstaff; Counts as a magical weapon (PHB 275)

name: Shocking Grasp
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: Melee,
Advantage if target is wearing metal armor, target cannot take reactions until its next turn (PHB 275)

name: Vicious Mockery
properties:
Type: Cantrip 
Range: 60 ft,
Wis save, success - no damage, fail - also disadv. on next attack roll in next turn; 1 creature (PHB 285)
